discourse_list.title: Council of Berlin 2018 - let us know if you are coming

content.content: @boris has put together a landing page and interest form; he will be spending the Summer in Berlin and will be helping organize the Council event. Thanks, @boris! So here’s the ask: please fill out the “Expression of Interest” form. It will help us understand how big our meeting space needs to be! https://ethereum-magicians.github.io/berlin-council/ We will keep the information collected private.

We are not getting many survey responses on day 1. I am adding the direct link here:   docs.google.com    Berlin Council July 2018 Expression of Interest Where: Berlin, Germany Venue TBD  When: July 9 - 10 or July 14 - 15, TBD  What: The Fellowship of Ethereum Magicians are organizing the next council. This is a technical session, working towards: - improving Ethereum technically - nurture community...      We really want people to fill this out as the first step in shaping the event.
